result.arabic_text: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ
result.translation: (51) And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before,[891] and We were of him well-Knowing
result.footnotes: [891]- i.e., before Moses.  Allāh had guided him from early youth.
